locations: Nashville, Tennessee, USA::(1242 Old Hillsboro Road, Nashville, Tennessee, USA)
imdb.plot outline: Nashville Country Revival is shot on location in Nashville, TN and features major Christian Artists and many Country Personalities with an Inspirational testimony. Concept Videos, Live Performances and Personal In-depth Interviews make up "NCR". Hosted by TV Veteran, Bill Traylor, the show is filled with inspirational and entertaining Christian Country oriented songs with some guest performances.
imdb.title: Nashville Country Revival
